name: Lost in Parallels (itch)
description:
⚠ On WebBrowser version, you need to click on the game so the cursor of your mouse is captured !


Explore the infinite dimensions of Lost in Parallels using your flash light !
Collect key objects to access new dimensions !

Challenge your friends and try to put the best score on the speedrun leaderboard  !

CONTROLS
Move: Q/A and D
Jump: SpaceUse the flash light: move your mouse
Pause: Esc or P

⚠ On WebBrowser version, you need to click on the game so the cursor of your mouse is captured !


CREDITS

Martin Hell - Game Design / ProgrammingPierre Thibault - Music and SFX


Godot Engine

Recommendations

We Recommend to play on downloaded versions as HTML version suffers fps drops on some devices/browser.
The game can be fully enjoyed with the versions available for download.

Please note the MACOSX and LINUX version have not being tested yet.
